course_title: Introduction to Endangered Language Documentation and Revitalization

sections.comments: This course is now full. Please register in FNEL 180 WL1 to be added to the waitlist.

This is a waitlist section for undergraduate students  - only register in this section if FNEL 180 001 is full. Registering in the waitlist section does not guarantee you a spot in the course. When spots open up you will be moved from this section to the actual course. Email cis.program@ubc.ca with any questions.

description: Foundational concepts in the critical study of cultural, historical, social, and political factors that impact language loss, retention, and revival. Introducing strategies and practical methodologies for collaborative, interdisciplinary, community-based documentation and revitalization projects for First Nations and Indigenous languages.
